New Records: Fakhar Zaman's 126* off 81 balls is one of the best innings he has played, and he has also moved to the top of the most sixes in World Cup 2023 with 18* in 3 inns
Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman's unbeaten 126 off 81 balls was a key factor in Pakistan's win
New Zealand posted a staggering 401 runs in their first innings
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's captain Babar Azam emphasized the importance of building partnerships and giving maximum strike to Fakhar Zaman
New Zealand's captain Kane Williamson said that the ground wasn't big enough for Fakhar Zaman, and he played an exceptional knock
Post-Match Reflections: Fakhar Zaman said that he was thankful it was his day and that he enjoyed the innings, and that the team will play aggressively from now on
Babar Azam said that the team planned to build partnerships and that Fakhar Zaman's knock was exceptional
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was affected by rain, and the DLS method was used to determine the winner
Pakistan moved level with New Zealand on eight points in the World Cup table, but are still behind in net run rate
The result has heightened Pakistan's chances of sneaking into a semifinal spot
